name: Melder
headline: Automate analysis and biz processes w/ an AI native spreadsheet
description:
Melder is a spreadsheet tool that has AI functions and data representations at its core. Upload files directly to cells, use functions like =GEN, and build automations directly from the workbook.

We make it easy for business users to uncover insights in their documents, automate away their emails, and even deploy simple AI chatbots.

'Excel' is the backbone that codifies structured data business logic today, we're taking that UX to the unstructured data world.

founders.name: Ashwin Dharne, Founder
founders.description: Building AI tools for supply chain teams. Ex-Google engineer that worked on security and conversational AI.

founders.name: Philip Brewer, Founder
founders.description:
Building the 'Excel for unstructured data'

Ex-Bain Consultant | Indiana University | Amateur Improv Comedy Player

# Automate your job with an AI spreadsheet
Melder makes creating AI analysis and applications as simple as building an Excel model
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6794004dd5e37395d4b037e8_background2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793e67cfb58359422f90bc8_9hud4u.gif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6794190f4da8fe0def68694c_citation2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793c6162f81e64b74cad360_experience%20fx.png)
## Founded by former‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793b9b61dec8a45fac1520c_google-grey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793ba087d8dd98cb4b66f45_baingrey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/67941b3626be74d6d6cdf819_yc-grey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793b7a95edf646430f1d887_ucla-grey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793bac87fa17b5bf42f6de0_pwc-grey.png)
## What people are doing
### Custom solutions for any use
[Financial Statements](https://melder.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[HR onboarding](https://melder.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Academic Research](https://melder.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Site Scraping](https://melder.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![Abstract 3D shapes, bubbles in orange and blue.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793b610c0075a3bc7332009_blobs3.webp)
### Pull insights from dozens of SEC filings all at one
We convert PDFs to AI friendly data for instant review. Whether it's revenue growth, new product launch information, or holdings shifts - our tool can extract it across filings in just a few seconds.
[Get demo](https://melder.io/<https:/calendly.com/d/cmxs-b55-bry/connect-with-melder-founder>)
![Abstract 3D shapes, bubbles in orange and blue.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793b610c0075a3bc733200b_blobs2.webp)
### Answering insurance, payroll, and company culture questions just got easy
Simply share a Melder spreadsheet with all your company HR documents in it and new employees can chat with them to learn more. You can even add simple logic to tailor relevant documents for each employee.
[Get demo](https://melder.io/<https:/calendly.com/d/cmxs-b55-bry/connect-with-melder-founder>)
![Abstract 3D shapes, bubbles in orange and blue.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793b610c0075a3bc733200b_blobs2.webp)
### Breeze through literature and case reviews.
In one quick you can upload all of the papers you'd like to review and ask questions to each all at once. No more digging to determine if population groups match your area of focus, just get the answer on hundreds of papers all at once.
[Get demo](https://melder.io/<https:/calendly.com/d/cmxs-b55-bry/connect-with-melder-founder>)
![Abstract 3D shapes, bubbles in orange and blue.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6793b610c0075a3bc733200b_blobs2.webp)
### Pulling info from the web made easy
Whether it's reading keeping up to date on competitors, reading web articles, or just keeping tabs on your favorite band, we can web scrape it. Just use our "=SITE(_url_)" function and forget you ever used to skin headlines yourself.
[Get demo](https://melder.io/<https:/calendly.com/d/cmxs-b55-bry/connect-with-melder-founder>)
## we are Melder
### Access the cutting edge of AI
50+
Cells per second
15+
AI Formulas
5+
Model Options
100%
Specialized for you
## this is how it works
## Build AI automations you can trust
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6794190f4da8fe0def68694c_citation2.png)
### Instant citation
AI 'hallucinations' can stop use for high importance analysis. We fix that by providing side by side citation for every cell, allowing quick verification of accuracy
#### Automated analysis
Create a sequence for AI analysis once, let it run forever. We process files, scrape websites, and ingest information from your data connections automatically. This lets you focus on operating your business instead of chasing down information
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6794004dd5e37395d4b037e8_background2.png)
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
### Frequently Asked Questions
Our product is unlike any other - so we clarified a few common questions below.
How can I get access?
Today Melder is in its 'Alpha' stage. Eventually we will be open for the masses, but if you want access early please contact us below. We are obsessed with spreadsheets and AI, so we want our early product in the hands of truly passionate users!
Why isn't Melder an Excel add on?
Add ons to Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets are limited by the underlying spreadsheet provider themselves. Legacy spreadsheets were designed for numbers and simple text data, which fundamentally breaks for AI use cases. We built a spreadsheet engine from the ground up, handling task execution, data storage, and UX in a totally new way.
How is this different from other 'spreadsheet' AI tools?
Most 'spreadsheet' AI tools are actually 'tables' with a pretty front end. Ultimately this means you are limited to very small set of extraction and summarization tasks and have no easy way to build more complex AI tools like custom RAG (Retrieval Augment Generation) apps.
Should this replace my current spreadheets?
Melder has all the core spreadsheet functions/tools, so you can use it for most taks! You may miss some features Excel power users are used to (particularly if you're doing complex financial analysis). That's why we allow you to easily export to Excel/Google sheets, letting you get the best of both worlds.
### Still have a question?
We are here to answer
[Contact](https://melder.io/</about>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793b610c0075a3bc7331f2b/6794121e20ea364605ef6fc8_84cbbd5e75e5d56be4ae3bc9945a75d6_melder-name%20logo.png)](https://melder.io/</>)

generated_description:
**Melder: Automating Analysis and Business Processes with AI-Powered Spreadsheets**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, Melder is revolutionizing the way businesses handle data. With a compact team of just two employees based in New York, the company is on a mission to simplify the analysis and automation of business processes through an innovative spreadsheet tool that incorporates AI functions at its core.

**Mission and Vision**  
Melder’s primary goal is to allow business users to effortlessly extract insights from their documents, automate tedious email tasks, and even set up AI chatbots—all from within a modern spreadsheet interface that transcends traditional tools like Excel. They believe that while Excel remains the backbone of structured data, unstructured data deserves a similar level of accessibility and efficiency.

**What Melder Does**  
At its core, Melder combines robust data representation capabilities with AI-driven functionalities. Users can upload files directly into cells, employ AI functions such as `=GEN`, and create complex automations without needing extensive technical knowledge. Not limited to conventional spreadsheets, Melder is designed for diverse applications, including financial analysis, HR onboarding, academic research, and web scraping. 

**Key Features**  
- **Instant AI Analysis:** Melder enables businesses to automate the processing of information, be it through file ingestion or web scraping, allowing teams to refocus on strategic initiatives.
- **AI Citation:** It addresses common issues of misinformation by providing citations alongside analyzed data, fostering trust in the results.
- **Data Extraction from SEC Filings:** The tool converts PDFs into AI-friendly formats, allowing quick and insightful analysis of key financial metrics.
  
**User Interface Design**  
Melder is engineered from the ground up to handle task execution and data storage, designed to serve AI's needs rather than fitting within the existing paradigms of traditional spreadsheet software. This allows for more advanced capabilities than simple data tables found in current spreadsheet AI tools.

**Current Development Stage**  
As of now, Melder is in its Alpha phase—eager to refine its tool by engaging with passionate early users who understand the nuances of spreadsheets and AI.

**Conclusion**  
In a world where data is increasingly important and voluminous, Melder is positioned as a promising solution that blends the familiarity of spreadsheets with the power of AI. If you're interested in being one of the first to explore this innovative tool, you can keep an eye on their developments through their [website](https://melder.io) and join their waitlist. 

With Melder, the future of automated data analysis is not just a promise; it's already in progress.
